_sText:
Thanks for downloading the re-release of my map, the first release was basically a beta test uploaded by a friend of mine.
This new version of the map now includes:
-Breakable platform in the sky
-Awp and Auto snipes are now located on the breakable platform
-Teleporter platform that takes you to the breakable platform
-Hidden teleporter used to get off of the breakable platform(Picture located on the download page shows location)
and thats about it.

Basic install, just place it into "C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\accountname\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps" to play it in single player. 

Or you could place it into "C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\accountname\source dedicated server\cstrike\Maps" to host it on a dedicated server.

Enjoy :)
